entry_doors.description:
The Embarq fiberglass entry door represents the first product born from ProVia’s enVision™ innovation philosophy—reimagining how entry systems are engineered for energy efficiency, longevity, beauty, and structural integrity. This door is widely recognized as the most energy-efficient entry door in the U.S. market. It delivers an unprecedented U-Factor of 0.09 with its extra-thick 2.5-inch slab (43% thicker than traditional 1¾-inch exterior doors). To accommodate increased insulation, ProVia engineered internal channels in the stiles and rails to accept a larger polyurethane core. This core is injected using a computer-controlled foam-fill process that eliminates voids and maximizes thermal resistance. 

Structurally, stiles and rails are precision-dovetailed and bonded at each corner, forming a rigid, integrated frame resistant to warping, splitting, denting, and cracking. The door edge is crafted from real cherry, mahogany, or oak, harmonizing with selected skins. The 4¼-inch finger-jointed, 4-ply hardwood strike stile provides exceptional strength and a solid anc7 Earned, 8 more to go.hor point for Emtek® hardware, the exclusive hardware option for Embarq systems. The Z-AC threshold includes an auto-adjusting riser to maintain a tight seal, while the dual perimeter seal system forms a superior air and thermal barrier. A custom-designed sweep compensates for the door’s unique thickness to prevent drafts and environmental intrusion.

The authentic wood appearance is achieved using MasterGrain™ NVD (Nickel Vapor Deposition) technology, delivering premium grain realism. The DuraFuse™ P3 Fusion finishing system—applied through 7-step stain or 9-step glazed finishing processes—offers exceptional UV resistance, durability, and long-term color stability. Stain and paint finishing options include Cherry, Mahogany, Oak, and Knotty Alder skins with extensive color selections.

For glass options, Embarq exclusively uses the proprietary Quad Glass System engineered under enVision technology. The ComforTech™ QLK (Krypton-filled) glass achieves an R-Value of 10, while QLA (Argon-filled) achieves an R-Value of 9. These systems use multiple Low-E coated surfaces, inert gas fills, a Super Spacer®, and a Tri-Seal design, producing the most energy-efficient glass packages available in residential entry doors. All Embarq door styles, sidelites, and lites must use Quad Glass.

Exterior hardware is limited to premium Emtek® systems, with multiple handle styles such as Melrose, Imperial, Ribbon & Reed, Orleans, Marietta, and modern lever/knob options. Matching finishes include Lifetime Bright Brass, Satin Nickel, Oil Rubbed Bronze, and Lifetime Black. Frame compatibility includes FrameSaver®, FusionFrame®, and PermaTech®, all offering lifetime durability. Embarq also supports accessories such as Colonial door knockers, peepholes, kick plates, faux speakeasy windows, hinge straps, and clavos for decorative styling.

Overall, Embarq represents a breakthrough in both performance and craftsmanship, offering a sophisticated look with industry-leading insulation, structural stability, advanced glass engineering, and long-term finish durability. It is specifically designed for homeowners seeking best-in-class efficiency, security, and luxury aesthetics in a premium entry system.
key_features: 2.5 inch thick door (43% thicker than standard)
Quad Glass System with R-10 value

skin_options.description: Image shows skins options available for embarq doors

compatible_finishes.paint: All standard and trending colors available

compatible_frames.name: FusionFrame
compatible_frames.material: LVL interior + FrameSaver bottom + composite exterior

restrictions.glass: Requires Quad Glass System (QLK or QLA)

entry_doors.description: Signet Fiberglass doors are engineered to deliver exceptional structural integrity, authentic wood aesthetics, and industry-leading finish durability. Available in Cherry, Mahogany, Oak, Fir, Knotty Alder, and Smooth Series, Signet doors surpass traditional fiberglass construction through robust hardwood stiles and rails that are precision dovetailed and glued at each corner to form a solid, integrated frame. The 2⅝-inch finger-jointed, 3-ply hardwood hinge stile and the 4¼-inch finger-jointed, 4-ply hardwood strike stile offer superior mounting strength and long-term durability for decorative hardware. Every door is foam-filled by a computer-driven injection process that ensures optimal insulation, efficiency, and internal stability. Signet’s realistic wood appearance is achieved through MasterGrain’s advanced NVD (Nickel Vapor Deposition) technology, with matching real-wood edges crafted from Cherry, Mahogany, Oak, or Fir. Scientifically formulated fiberglass compounds give the door exceptional resistance to denting, warping, cracking, and splitting, while high-definition panel profiles create crisp shadow lines and rich architectural detail. Signet also features Plugless Window Trim (not available on Fir), a Z-AC threshold with auto-adjusting riser, high-performance composite bottom rails for rot resistance, and an ENERGY STAR®–qualified design on most configurations. All Signet doors utilize ProVia’s exclusive DuraFuse™ Finishing System with P3 Fusion, enabling a best-in-class 10-year finish warranty and offering a wide selection of stains and paints. Homeowners can fully customize both sides of the door with different styles and finishes, and ProVia accommodates custom widths and heights in precise 1/8-inch increments. The interior frame is hand-stained or painted to match, ensuring a consistent, premium appearance from every angle.
key_features: Custom widths and heights available (1/8 inch increments)

compatible_finishes.paint: All standard and trending colors available

compatible_frames.name: FusionFrame
compatible_frames.material: LVL interior + FrameSaver bottom + composite exterior

entry_doors.description: Heritage Fiberglass doors are designed to deliver a refined woodgrain appearance with enhanced texture, improved definition embossing, and a durable hardwood edge that helps prevent warping over time. Available in Oak, Smooth, and Hemlock skin options, these doors offer a versatile aesthetic suited for both traditional and modern entryways. Most Heritage Fiberglass Entry Systems are ENERGY STAR® certified, providing reliable energy efficiency for the home. ProVia also offers custom door and sidelite heights in precise 1/8-inch increments, allowing homeowners to achieve an exact fit for unique openings. Supported by a 10-year finish warranty and compatible with a wide range of paint and stain options, Heritage doors combine strength, style, and performance in a value-focused fiberglass solution. Heritage Fiberglass doors are engineered for durability, energy efficiency, and the authentic look of real wood. Their polyurethane core significantly reduces energy loss, while improved definition panel profiles create crisp shadow lines and distinctive panel designs. Both the hinge and strike sides use 1⅞-inch finger-jointed, 2-ply solid oak laminated stiles that provide enhanced rigidity and long-term structural integrity. The variable-depth woodgrain texture, paired with hand-applied stain, closely replicates the appearance of natural wood, and the square-edge design further enhances the traditional wood door aesthetic. Specially engineered fiberglass facings prevent denting and resist splitting, cracking, and warping, ensuring a long-lasting, low-maintenance entry system. The reinforced lock area offers a secure mounting surface for decorative hardware, and optional Plugless Window Trim provides a clean, finished appearance. A high-performance composite bottom rail delivers excellent rot resistance, while the ZAI™ threshold features a manually adjustable riser with matching screw cover caps and comes standard in an aluminum mill finish—creating a reliable and durable seal at the base of the door.
key_features: 1.875 inch finger-jointed 2-ply solid oak laminated stiles

compatible_frames.name: FusionFrame
compatible_frames.material: LVL interior + FrameSaver bottom + composite exterior

entry_doors.description: Legacy Steel entry doors are engineered to deliver exceptional durability, structural strength, and energy efficiency, making them a professional-class upgrade for any home. Available in multiple skin options—including Smooth Steel, Woodgrain Textured Steel, Smooth with High-Definition Embossing, and Smooth with Shaker Embossing—Legacy doors provide versatile design choices while maintaining an elegant, long-lasting finish backed by a 10-year warranty. Most Legacy Steel Entry Systems are ENERGY STAR® certified, supported by composite top and bottom endcaps that enhance rigidity and thermal performance. The door slab features a continuous piece of steel across the edges and face for superior strength and dent resistance, while the computer-driven foam-fill process ensures optimal insulation throughout the core. A rigid composite lock block reinforces the lock and deadbolt area for enhanced security, and ProVia’s exclusive tab-and-slot mechanical interlock system provides exceptional structural stability with reduced heat and cold transfer. Legacy full-lite and half-lite door styles use ComforTech™ Low-E glazing for ENERGY STAR qualification, with a slight tint that is best matched by ordering corresponding sidelites and transoms. Homeowners can fully customize both sides of the door with different styles and finishes, and ProVia offers custom widths and heights in precise 1/8-inch increments for perfect fitting. Optional Plugless Window Trim provides clean, fastener-free detailing, and every system includes a Z-AC threshold with an auto-adjusting riser and aluminum mill finish for reliable sealing performance. Overall, Legacy Steel doors combine the strength of 20-gauge galvannealed steel—49% thicker than standard 24-gauge doors—with advanced energy-saving technologies for a premium, secure, and highly efficient entry solution.

compatible_frames.name: FusionFrame
compatible_frames.material: LVL interior + FrameSaver bottom + composite exterior

entry_doors.name: French Door Systems
entry_doors.description: ProVia French Door systems provide a versatile double-door configuration that combines elegance, functionality, and security. All door styles across the product lines can be ordered as French Doors, giving homeowners the ability to customize panel layouts, finish options, hardware, and glass packages. French Doors can be built as inswing or outswing units, with the active door located on either the left or right side. Both doors are hinged on opposite ends and feature center-mounted hardware positions, while the inactive door includes a fully integrated astragal system with top and bottom slide bolts for secure locking. The astragal tightly seals into the threshold and head jamb, improving energy efficiency and weather protection. These systems are compatible with FrameSaver® frames or Steel L-Frames, support optional Trilennium® multi-point hardware, and include a header security plate when using a FrameSaver® system. Hardware such as locksets, deadbolts, and kickplates are installed on both active and inactive doors, while all supplemental hardware is placed on the active door only. Unequal French Doors are also available, enabling daily use of a wider active door with the flexibility to open the narrower inactive leaf when needed.
key_features: All door styles available as French Door configurations
Available with FrameSaver® or Steel L-Frame
Hinged on opposite ends with centered hardware layout
Left or right active door options
Inactive door includes astragal with top & bottom slide bolts
Header security plate included with FrameSaver® installations
Unequal French Door option available for wider daily-use access

astragal_details.description: The French Door astragal provides enhanced functionality, sealing performance, and improved security.
features: Secures inactive door at both top and bottom
Lockable throw bolts improve structural and forced-entry resistance
Astragal bolt penetrates threshold for a superior weather barrier
Astragal boot creates an enhanced seal against the elements
Stained to match Signet Fiberglass stained doors

entry_doors.name: Doors Without Glass
entry_doors.description: Solid-panel entry systems designed for maximum privacy and durability. Available across multiple series and materials (fiberglass and 20-gauge steel), these doors provide the same structural integrity, finish options, and frame compatibility as glazed entry systems while omitting lites. Ideal for homeowners seeking full privacy, robust weather performance, and a consistent exterior appearance.

warranty.glass_and_seal: Lifetime Limited (applies to applicable components; includes seal failure)

entry_doors.energy_certification: All entry systems without glass are ENERGY STAR® Certified.

eight_foot_availability.note: Certain styles are available in 8' height; availability varies by series.

glass_options.name: ComforTech Warm Edge Glazing System
glass_options.description: Measurably improves thermal performance with better energy efficiency and warmer glass edge using Super Spacer technology.
glass_options.warranty: Lifetime Limited (includes glass breakage and seal failure)
key_features: No metal spacer - eliminates thermal conductivity
Available in Double, Triple, and Quad configurations

glass_options.name: Decorative Glass Collection
glass_options.description: ProVia’s decorative glass is crafted by highly skilled artisans who hand-bevel, cut, miter, and solder each component into intricate, artistically designed patterns. These panels are intentionally created with aesthetic imperfections—such as textural waves, striations, and small air bubbles known as seeds—to replicate the character of hand-made sheet glass from centuries past. Each panel is unique, with no two sheets ever identical, and these natural variations contribute to the charm, authenticity, and visual personality of the glass while maintaining complete structural stability. Every piece is rigorously inspected for quality and consistency, ensuring that patterns vary naturally but never beyond acceptable artistic and structural standards. All ProVia decorative glass features exclusive designs available only on ProVia doors, enhancing entryway uniqueness. Each panel also incorporates the ComforTech™ Warm Edge Glazing System for improved thermal efficiency and reduced heat transfer. Impact Shield versions are available for increased protection, using laminated glass engineered to withstand repeated impacts from storm debris or intrusion attempts. Every decorative glass unit is backed by a Lifetime Limited Warranty, which includes coverage for both glass breakage and seal failure, ensuring long-term performance and peace of mind.
glass_options.warranty: Lifetime Limited (includes glass breakage and seal failure)
glass_options.included_features: All decorative glass includes ComforTech glazing system

style_details.name: Mirage
style_details.description: Mirage offers effortless style, with narrow/thin reed glass all over, complemented by clear beveled glass. Zinc caming tops it off, making it a simple, modern and attractive design.

style_details.name: Brookhaven
style_details.description: Brookhaven is accented with gray antique glass, giving it a subtle hint of color. The hammered glass delivers some privacy and is accentuated with clear beveled and microcubed glass throughout.

style_details.name: Manhattan
style_details.description: Manhattan features streamed glass, clear bevels and gray softwave, combining simplicity and modern style. Accent it with either patina or zinc caming to customize the look.

style_details.name: Essence
style_details.description: Essence features a bronze softwave glass combined with micro-granite that brings elegance to a whole new level.

style_details.name: Cheyenne
style_details.description: Cheyenne features micro-granite, hammered and beveled glass that will add elegance to your entryway, while providing a high level of privacy.

style_details.name: SYMPHONY
style_details.description: Symphony features a bronze softwave and expresses timeless beauty and elegance at every curve. This design is sure to bring you a pleasing and melodious style.

style_details.name: BERKLEY
style_details.description: Berkley features micro-iced granite, clear bevels, and small hammered with a timeless herringbone pattern that complements modern, contemporary and Arts & Crafts architecture.

style_details.name: LAURENCE
style_details.description: Laurence features a gray softwave expressing defined classical vintage that will greet your guests with its distinguished character and prominent lines.

style_details.name: CARRINGTON
style_details.description: Carrington features small hammered, flat seedy and clear bevels in an attractive vintage design to accent your home’s entryway.

style_details.name: TACOMA
style_details.description: Tacoma features hammered and micro-granite design reminiscent of the Arts and Crafts period. Tacoma adds a southwestern inspired theme bringing heritage

style_details.name: SOMERSET
style_details.description: Somerset features small hammered, micro granite and clear bevels in a simple yet elegant design that gives a fresh look to your entryway.

style_details.name: CARMEN
style_details.description: Carmen features a refreshing new style for an entrance way with old world style charm. Standard with Chinchilla privacy glass and also available in all privacy glass options.

style_details.name: BARCELONA
style_details.description: Barcelona features an exquisite wrought iron design with the option of choosing gluechip (standard), waterfall, taffeta, chinchilla, obscure pebble or clear glass.

style_details.name: CONSTANCE
style_details.description: Constance features gluechip, medium gray softwave and beveled edge glue chip resulting in a traditional design that gives your entryway an elegant look

style_details.name: TRANQUILITY
style_details.description: Tranquility features unique Chinchilla glass accented with beveled clusters and streamed glass.

style_details.name: GEMSTONE
style_details.description: Beautiful beveled glass with iced and micro-iced granite, accented with zinc caming, gives this classic design a contemporary edge.

style_details.name: ECLIPSE
style_details.description: Eclipse features double gluechip and clusters of bevel with a traditional and harmonious design. Eclipse promotes classical elegance and privacy

style_details.name: FLORENCE
style_details.description: This traditional style is accented with a creamy alabaster glass adding interest and appeal that clearly sets it apart from other decorative designs

style_details.name: ESMOND
style_details.description: Esmond features small hammered, bevels in a splendid old-world style design bringing a unique touch to your entryway.

style_details.name: CARLISLE
style_details.description: Carlisle features clear bevels, arctic and seedy glass giving an appealing entranceway to any style of home.

style_details.name: TWILIGHT
style_details.description: Twilight is a beautifully decorative silk-screened art. It’s unique frosted glass adds to the warmth and privacy of your home.

style_details.name: BRAINSTORM
style_details.description: Appealing to both mid-modern and modern design sensibilities, Brainstorm's exterior vertical pattern and interior chevron motif combine for an appearance with both subtlety and substance. Brainstorm layered glass has a medium to medium-high privacy range.

style_details.name: REPARTEE
style_details.description: Repartee's frosted layers and geometric grid combine for a design that plays with opacity and movement. Squares and trapezoids carry on a lively back-and-forth as light and vantage points change their appearance. Repartee layered glass offers a high privacy range.

glass_options.compatible_with: All entry door series (Embarq, Signet, Heritage, Legacy)

glass_options.name: Privacy Glass Options
glass_options.description: Allows light to filter in while keeping high level of privacy.
glass_options.compatible_with: All door styles with glass options

glass_options.name: Internal Blinds
glass_options.description: White Internal Blinds are constructed with sturdy white aluminum and enclosed in tempered safety glass. Easy to clean; no more dusting of blinds. Internal Blinds are suitable for entry doors, sidelites and patio doors and carry a 10-Year Warranty. Colored Internal blinds are now offered in four neutral hues to complement any room in the house. Easy to clean; no more dusting of blinds. Internal Blinds are suitable for entry doors, patio doors and windows. Offering a 10-Year Warranty.

hardware.name: Trilennium Multi-Point Locking System
hardware.description: Three 1 inch deadbolts with anti-saw hardened steel pins and solid I-beam full length.

hardware.name: Emtek Mortise Hardware
hardware.description: EMTEK’s Mortise hardware provides enhanced functionality through integrated push-button passage controls, allowing more flexible passage and locking options. Each piece is crafted with heavy-duty forged brass construction for long-lasting durability and premium appearance, while the solid brass nose bolts on the latches ensure reliable performance. The hardware is backed by a Lifetime Mechanical Warranty, reinforcing its long-term value, and a Lifetime Anti-Tarnish Finish Warranty that preserves its beauty for life. EMTEK Mortise hardware is only available for Signet Fiberglass and 20-gauges stell doors

hardware.name: Emtek Interconnect Hardware
hardware.description: EMTEK’s unique Interconnect Device combines the security of a locking deadbolt with a panic-proof exit system, allowing both the deadbolt and passage latch to retract simultaneously when the interior knob or lever is turned. The hardware is built from heavy-duty forged brass, ensuring long-lasting beauty and structural durability, and uses reinforced springs to prevent lever sag. Threaded brass tubes and solid brass nose bolts provide added strength and reliability in everyday use. EMTEK supports this system with a Lifetime Mechanical Warranty and a Lifetime Anti-Tarnish Finish Warranty, guaranteeing dependable performance and lasting appearance. The hardware is available in a range of premium finishes, including Lifetime Bright Brass, Lifetime Satin Nickel, Lifetime Oil Rubbed Bronze, and Lifetime Black.
key_features: Single motion unlocks both deadbolt and latch

hardware.name: Schlage Electronic Hardware
hardware.description: Schlage Vintage hardware offers more than timeless aesthetics—it delivers durable, high-performance security designed to last. Each piece is crafted from solid cast brass for long-lasting beauty and features a maximum-security deadbolt for enhanced peace of mind. Nickel silver pins and keys ensure smooth, reliable operation, while heavy-duty springs provide strong, droop-free lever performance. Engineered with superior components and tested for over 400,000 operational cycles, Schlage Vintage hardware is built for exceptional longevity. It is backed by a Lifetime Mechanical Warranty and a Lifetime Anti-Tarnish Finish Warranty, ensuring both lasting value and enduring appearance.

hardware.name: Schlage Sense Smart Deadbolt
hardware.description: The Schlage Sense Smart Deadbolt simplifies daily access with a touchscreen keypad and easy Bluetooth pairing to the free Schlage Sense app for iOS and Android. Share access with trusted users, store up to 19 user codes, and control lock/unlock behavior locally or remotely when paired with the optional Wi-Fi Adapter. The lock includes a 9V battery backup, illuminated keypad and lever, is designed to operate in variable conditions (including rain and while wearing gloves), and combines convenience with rated security and reliable battery life.

products.name: Schlage Sense Smart Deadbolt
features: Works in rain and with gloves

products.name: Schlage Classic Hardware
products.description: Schlage Classic hardware delivers understated, long-lasting aesthetic and functional performance. Constructed for durability and tested for reliable operation, the Classic line includes a range of keyed locksets, passage latches, thumbturn deadbolts, and accent levers suited to both exterior and interior doors. A broad selection of finishes is available to match traditional home styles and optional accessories (door knockers, kick plates, peepholes) expand customization.

warranty.finish: Lifetime (finish warranty time period may be limited to five years in Impact Shield regions)

Schlage_classic_door products.name: Latitude Lever with Century Trim Keyed Lockset
Thumbturn 1 Deadbolt (Interior Only 1-Sided)
features: Interior thumbturn option for single-sided applications
Note: interior-only thumbturns may present egress considerations

products.name: Electronic Touch Keypad Deadbolt
products: ACCENT LEVER TOUCH KEYPAD ELECTRONIC KEYLESS LOCKSET
features: Works in the rain and when you're wearing gloves
2-year battery life with a 9V battery backup
Illumination when you need it, on both the numbers and the lever
Graded Best in Residential Security, Durability,and Finish

products.name: Electronic Deadbolt
features: Deadbolt is available with any Schlage entry hardware
Easy to add or delete codes

finishes.name: Stain Finishes
finishes.description: This chunk contains detailed information about ProVia's stain finishing systems for Embarq, Signet, Heritage, and Legacy doors. It describes the multi-step handcrafted finishing processes—including the 7-step DuraFuse™ P3 Fusion stain process for Embarq/Signet and the oven-cured urethane finishing systems for Heritage and Legacy steel doors. It also lists all available stain color options for Cherry, Mahogany, Oak, Knotty Alder, and Fir, along with tone and undertone characteristics. The data includes durability warranties, process differences between product lines, and image references for finish samples and application steps such as hand staining and oven curing. Overall, this chunk provides a complete technical and aesthetic overview of ProVia’s wood-stain finish options across product families.

embarq_signet_options.process:
7-step with DuraFuse P3 Fusion technology: 1. DURAFUSE™ proprietary P3 Fusion Preparation Processes ensuring unprecedented finish durability
2. HAND-APPLIED STAIN FINISH formulated exclusively for Signet fiberglass doors
3. A layer of 2-part urethane, catalyst-hardened CLEAR COAT WITH UV INHIBITORS is applied
4. Clear coat is OVEN-CURED for lasting durability
5. The door is HAND-SANDED, preparing the surface for the second layer of clear coat
6. A second layer of 2-part urethane, catalyst-hardened CLEAR COAT WITH UV INHIBITORS is applied
7. The door is OVEN-CURED a second time, creating a long-lasting, durable finish

legacy_options.process: 1. Steel doors are A40 Hot-dipped Galvannealed (300% more coating thickness than 40Z full electrolytic zinc coated steel) to resist rust inside and out; 2. A 2-part urethane, catalyst-hardened BASE COAT (prime paint) is applied by a robotic reciprocating paint system; 3. Base coat is OVEN-CURED for lasting durability; 4. HAND-APPLIED STAIN FINISH is added for enhanced beauty; 5. A layer of 2-part urethane, catalyst-hardened CLEAR COAT WITH UV INHIBITORS is applied; 6. The door is OVEN-CURED a second time, creating a long-lasting, durable finish

process: A 2-part urethane, catalyst-hardened BASE COAT (prime paint) is applied by a robotic reciprocating paint system
Base coat is OVEN-CURED for lasting durability
HAND-APPLIED STAIN FINISH is added for enhanced beauty
A layer of 2-part urethane, catalyst-hardened CLEAR COAT WITH UV INHIBITORS is applied
The door is OVEN-CURED a second time, creating a long-lasting, durable finish

finishes.name: Glazed Finishes
finishes.description: Distinctive glazed finishing sytem giving each door a unique aged look through 9-step process.
finishes.process: The Embarq and Signet glazed finishing system begins with DURAFUSE™, a proprietary P3 Fusion preparation process that enhances long-term finish durability. A 2-part urethane, catalyst-hardened base coat is applied and then oven-cured to create a strong foundation. Skilled craftsmen hand-apply a specially formulated stain finish, after which a urethane clear coat with UV inhibitors is added to protect the surface. This clear coat is oven-cured for durability, and the door is then hand-sanded to ensure a flawless surface for the next layer. A second UV-protected urethane clear coat is applied and oven-cured once more, resulting in an xceptionally durable, long-lasting, and richly detailed finish.

finishes.name: Paint Finishes

paint_finishing_system.name: Legacy Paints
paint_finishing_system.description: Legacy steel doors are manufactured using A40 Hot-dipped Galvannealed steel, which provides 300% more protective coating than standard 40Z electrolytic zinc steel to resist rust both inside and out. A 2-part urethane, catalyst-hardened base coat is applied by a robotic reciprocating paint system to ensure complete coverage and consistency. This base coat is then oven-cured for long-lasting durability. After curing, the door receives a 2-part urethane, catalyst-hardened finish coat that enhances appearance and protection. The door is oven-cured a second time, producing a strong, resilient, and highly durable finish designed to withstand years of exposure.

paint_finishing_system.name: Embarq/Signet Paints
paint_finishing_system.description: The Embarq and Signet paint finishing system begins with DURAFUSE™, a proprietary P3 Fusion preparation process that delivers exceptional long-term finish durability. A 2-part urethane, catalyst-hardened base coat is applied using a robotic reciprocating paint system to ensure complete and even coverage. This base coat is then oven-cured to create a strong foundation. After curing, the door receives a 2-part urethane, catalyst-hardened finish coat that enhances surface protection and appearance. The door is oven-cured once again, producing a resilient, long-lasting finish designed to withstand harsh environmental conditions.

paint_finishing_system.name: Heritage Paints
paint_finishing_system.description: The Heritage and Legacy paint finishing system begins with the application of a 2-part urethane, catalyst-hardened base coat applied by a robotic reciprocating paint system for consistent and uniform coverage. This base layer is oven-cured to reinforce durability. After curing, the door is coated with a 2-part urethane, catalyst-hardened finish coat that provides enhanced protection and color stability. A second oven-curing cycle completes the process, creating a tough, long-lasting finish engineered to maintain its appearance over time.

finishes.limited_availability_note: Primrose Yellow, Enzian Blue, and Vallis Red have limited availability

patio_doors.name: Hinged Patio Door Systems
patio_doors.description: Hinged Patio Doors are swinging patio door systems available in 2 or 3-lite units and constructed of the same solid quality Signet® and Heritage™ Fiberglass, and Legacy™ Woodgrain Textured or Smooth Steel doors as our entry door units. Designer Patio Doors with Heritage Fiberglass are NOT available in Certified Wind Load regions. ProVia’s patio doors are built for strength, smooth operation, and long-lasting performance, beginning with a reinforced lock area that features a 20-gauge steel security plate for enhanced protection. The spring-loaded latch system automatically engages upon closing and includes an interior locking option for added convenience. Every patio door comes standard with BetterVue® fiberglass screen mesh, while heavy-duty fiberglass, aluminum, or SeeVue® stainless steel screen upgrades are available for increased durability and visibility. The top-hung aluminum screen frame glides effortlessly on ball-bearing rollers, preventing binding and ensuring smooth, reliable performance. Screen frames are offered in all 16 factory paint colors for a coordinated look. A Z-AC™ threshold with an auto-adjusting riser—available in Mill or Anodized Bronze—provides a secure seal, while Impact Shield–rated hinged patio doors include an oak-like riser and revised threshold design for added strength. ProVia offers patio doors in custom widths and heights in precise 1/8-inch increments, and all models are available in the full range of finishes shown in the catalog.
features: Schlage Flair handleset with Maximum Security deadbolt
Same finish options as entry doors

impact_shield.features: Heavy aluminum interlock on center stile

patio_doors.name: Vinyl Sliding Patio Door Systems
patio_doors.description: Vinyl Sliding Patio Doors are tested against the most stringent industry standards for air and water infiltration, wind load resistance, ease of operation, forced entry and much more. This means you’ll have lower heating and air-conditioning costs, easier cleaning, low maintenance and increased comfort. ProVia Vinyl Sliding Patio Doors are ENERGY STAR® certified and engineered for smooth, quiet, and secure performance. The top-hung aluminum screen glides effortlessly on ball-bearing rollers and comes standard with BetterVue® fiberglass mesh, with optional heavy-duty, stainless steel, or aluminum screens. AccuVent™ provides multiple venting positions using a sash lever and ratchet system—standard on Endure and optional on Aspect—offering convenient airflow with added security. A spring-loaded latch automatically engages upon closing, while galvanized steel-reinforced sills and panels ensure durability and structural rigidity. Multi-chamber vinyl frames with 4 9/16 depth enhance thermal efficiency and sound reduction, and Endure frames include Neopor® insulation. Fixed and operating panels interlock tightly for improved security, and a foot lock (standard on Aspect, optional on Endure) adds extra protection while ventilating. New welding technology provides cleaner corner aesthetics, and each operating panel includes four adjustable 1 rollers for smooth sliding action.
patio_doors.warranty: Lifetime Limited (includes glass breakage and seal failure)

construction.reinforcement: Galvanized steel in panels and sill

storm_doors.name: Spectrum Storm Door
storm_doors.description: ProVia storm doors are individually customized and built to the highest residential standards for homeowners who value uncompromising quality and long-lasting performance. Each door features a durable extruded aluminum frame with elegant rounded cove molding that enhances the glass edge and overall appearance. The oven-baked polyester paint finish provides exceptional durability and carries a Lifetime Warranty, ensuring beauty with minimal maintenance. All storm doors are constructed with tempered safety glass for enhanced security, and they are available for use in Impact Shield regions, although they are not wind-borne debris tested and therefore not considered Impact Shield products. ProVia’s storm doors include refined details such as color-matched aluminum screw covers for a clean, finished look, corrosion-proof corner gussets for added structural integrity, and high-quality hardware and door closers designed to ensure smooth, reliable operation. The air-release closer system enables continuous closing motion without rebound, improving usability and performance. Depending on the model, non-operable sashes are secured with color-matched polycarbonate clips or an internal sash lock system, and a bottom expander with sweep ensures a secure, custom fit to any entryway. The storm door paint finishing system uses a computer-controlled electrostatic application with a hydraulic reciprocator that atomizes paint for precise, even coverage across contoured surfaces. A wide selection of color options—including Snow Mist, Café Cream, Sandstone, Sterling Gray, Geneva Blue, Mountain Berry, Rustic Bronze, Tudor Brown, Coal Black, and more—allows homeowners to perfectly match their entry system. Backed by a Lifetime Finish Warranty, ProVia storm doors blend durability, craftsmanship, and beauty in every detail.
unique_features: Dual InVent retractable screens (top and bottom)
Hidden screens when not in use

storm_doors.name: Decorator Storm Door
storm_doors.description: Decorator Series provides a stylish, fresh look to accent your entry. Select one of the distinct styles from our Decorator Series storm doors.

storm_doors.name: DuraGuard Storm Door
storm_doors.description: DuraGuard is exactly what you need if you’re concerned about keeping your small children and pets safely inside. Select one of our doors with heavy-duty, non-removable stainless steel screening. DURAGUARD STORM DOORS INCLUDE: • Non-removable .023 stainless steel screen (only available on DuraGuard models) • Double seal bottom sweep •wide sculptured frame

storm_doors.name: DELUXE Storm Door
storm_doors.description: Deluxe Series is the answer whether you’re looking for additional light, ventilation or protection from the elements. You’ll find the exact style you’re looking for in our Deluxe Series of storm doors. DELUXE STORM DOORS INCLUDE: • Double seal bottom sweep • 1¼" x 35⁄8" wide sculptured frame • BetterVue® Fiberglass Screen STORM DOORS LIFETIME LIMITED WARRANTY Includes Glass Breakage

hardware.hinges: 4 color-matched leaf hinges with bronze bushings

storm_doors.name: Superview Storm Door
storm_doors.description: Superview storm doors offer a stylish, economical solution with essential features for light, ventilation, and everyday protection. Built with a sculptured frame, BetterVue® fiberglass screen, and color-matched hardware, the Superview series provides dependable performance and value in a clean, attractive package. Backed by a Lifetime Limited Warranty that includes glass breakage.

screen.notes: Full View and One-Lite screens include a horizontal stabilizer bar

hardware.standard: Black Pull Handle (also available in White)
hardware.hinges: 4 color-matched leaf hinges with bronze bushings

storm_doors.name: Spectrum Storm Door
storm_doors.description: Spectrum storm doors offer premium functionality with ProVia’s exclusive top and bottom InVent™ retractable screen system, providing unmatched venting flexibility and smooth operation. With a wide sculptured frame, triple-seal bottom sweep, reinforced aluminum kick panel, and Lifetime Limited Warranty including glass breakage, Spectrum combines ventilation, durability, and elegant styling in one advanced storm door system.
unique_features: Top and bottom InVent™ retractable screens
Greater venting flexibility than traditional storm doors
Triple-seal bottom sweep for superior weather protection

screen.system: InVent™ retractable screen system (top and bottom)
screen.benefits: Smooth, adjustable ventilation without removing screens
screen.notes: Some SH (single screen) styles include only top retractable screen with a fixed bottom sash

construction.kick_panel: Reinforced aluminum / dent-resistant depending on style
construction.glass: Tempered safety glass (Acrylic used automatically for oversized custom sashes)

hardware.standard: Satin Nickel Sierra solid brass mortise hardware (not recommended for coastal regions)
